attributes.action: Prevent the early release of Short Term and Long Term prisoners - just to overide over crowding in prisons!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition to is prevent the misuse of the powers of early release without prisoners appealing to leave early. The Government have and are planning again to release non-violent prisoners from prison without completing their full sentence. This is a misuse of law. Court has decided the length of sentence MP's should not be allowed to change the sentence due to the lack of cells. This must stop as it is putting local community in danger and is a mockery to the law. Knowing that a full sentence does not have to apply if they dont have enough cells. This must stop! Full sentences must be met! No More Early Releases! No More Putting Hard Working Public Members in Danger!
attributes.creator_name: Baron Tom Anthony James Buckley Thorp

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
